channel.title: Academic on Shaik Zakir Hussain
channel.description: Recent content in Academic on Shaik Zakir Hussain

item.title: Towards A Truly Connected World With 5G Technology
item.description: In June 2018, I have attended the VTC2018-Spring conference held in Porto, Portugal. In the conference, I have presented two papers in the areas of non-orthogonal multiple access (NOMA) and cognitive radio (CR) which fall under next-generation wireless technologies. After returning to IIIT, I have given my views on 5G to institute digital magazine. You can find the article here.
